entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add flexibility for versioned secrets to KeyPerFileConfigurationProvider/Source #59464
  • OIDC - Validation failure during PAR does not trigger OnAuthenticationFailed() event #59462
  • DataProtectionProvider fails to unprotect when hosted on IIS with keys persisted to the default location #59461
  • What is the right way to do GDPR cookie consent in Blazor Server? #59457
  • [Blazor] Getting rid of Blazor.boot.json and using a different strategy to flow the environment. #59456
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [OpenAPI] Not adding securitySchemas from document transformers #59454
  • [Blazor] Reconcile NavigationManager behavior #59451
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Hot reload testing improvements #59450
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor proper collapsible sidebar suboption indentation #59449

Closed

  • OAuth RedirectUri is not being applied #58855
  • Perf improvement: updates #59409
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #59448
  • OpenApi doc is not generated at build time #59434
  • SupplyParameterFromForm Issues biding Nullable enumerations within collections in complex objects in Blazor SSR #59364
  • Cache manifest.webmanifest in PWA #54953
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Recommended actions for upgrading across major Blazor versions #52022
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: updates #59430

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up publishing of installers built with shared tooling #59463
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • Include signing key for ValidIssuer when loading JwtBearerOptions from config #59460
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fixes a bug with form file binding when binding file name with index to an indexable collection #59459
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix: Include .webmanifest in Offline Cache for Default PWA Service Worker #59231
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Use a live crossgen2 for all builds #59447
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Use the Installers Arcade package to build the ref pack and targeting pack installers #59406
    blocked, area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues flaky tests #59411
    area-hosting, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Add IsEmptyOrAtEnd method to StringSegment #59242
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Added simplified null checking. #59331
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Replace ANY ip to root as url when generating OpenAPI's servers prope… #59314
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59349
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59348
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Return 206 Partial Content on Valid Range for Static Assets #59325
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Fix: Handle null event.submitter in enhanced form submission #59207
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
